subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In his first public comments since Alex Rodriguez’s drug-related suspension was reduced to 162 games, Hal Steinbrenner called Rodriguez an asset and did not rule out his return to the Yankees in 2015.
snippet: In his first public comments since Alex Rodriguez’s drug-related suspension was reduced to 162 games, Hal Steinbrenner called Rodriguez an asset and did not rule out his return to the Yankees in 2015.
